scripts.deploy: vitest --run && rm -rf ./dist && wrangler deploy --dry-run --outdir ./dist && pnpm run sentry-sourcemap && wrangler deploy ./dist/index.js --no-bundle
scripts.sentry-sourcemap: sentry-cli sourcemaps inject ./dist && sentry-cli sourcemaps upload ./dist --project=notion-gtasks-worker-cron
scripts.db:local:all: wrangler d1 execute notion-gtasks --local --command='SELECT * FROM users'
scripts.db:prod:all: wrangler d1 execute notion-gtasks --command='SELECT * FROM users'
scripts.db:prod:active-count: wrangler d1 execute notion-gtasks --command='SELECT COUNT(*) FROM users WHERE sync_error IS NULL AND last_synced IS NOT NULL'
scripts.db:prod:count: wrangler d1 execute notion-gtasks --command='SELECT COUNT(*) FROM users'
